title: Every cancer mage has the exact same niche
body:
It doesn't matter which mage you play. Mostly. All you need to do is land your low-cd cc ability, and once you do, you can just all-in with the rest of it. 
{{champion:103}} Oh, I charmed you with my E? Let me just Q W R really quickly. There, you're dead!
{{champion:34}} Oh, I stunned you with my Q? Let me just E R you really quickly. There, you're dead!
{{champion:136}} Oh, I stunned you with my Q? Let me, uh... umm... Hold on, I'm getting into position, umm...
{{champion:69}} Oh, I stunned you and all your friends for a long ass time with my R? Let me just Q E E E E E E E you really quickly, and now let me Q E E E E E your friend. Boom, you're dead!
{{champion:60}} Oh, I stunned you with my E? Let me just Q W R E W Q you really quickly. There, you're dead!
{{champion:105}} Oh, I threw my R somewhere in your general direction? Niceeeeeee.
{{champion:74}} Oh, I stunned you with my E? Ok, cool. Let me just sit back as- oh look, you're dead!
{{champion:85}} What's that? Every ability I use both stuns you and causes massive damage? Let me just use all of them! Boom, you're dead!
{{champion:7}} Oh, I hit you with my tether? Are you unable to flash out of its super long range? Let me just Q W R you really quickly. Boom, you're dead!
{{champion:99}} Oh, I rooted you with my Q? AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 
{{champion:25}} Oh, I rooted you with my Q? Not all angels are good! NOT ALL ANGELS ARE GOOD! NOT ALL ANGELS ARE GOOD!!!!!!!!
{{champion:61}} Oh, my Q is a reasonable distance from you? Let me just CC you with my massive, MASSIVE hitbox R and proceed to W Q you again. Boom, you're dead!
{{champion:134}} Oh, I stunned you with my E? Let me just walk up to you and Q W R you before the stun wears off. Boom, you're dead!
{{champion:45}} Oh, I stunned you with my E? Let me just W you and nothing else. Literally just my W, because you're an ADC. Boom, you're dead!
{{champion:161}} Oh, I knocked you back with my E? Let me just W Q W R you really quickly. Boom, you're dead!
{{champion:112}} Oh, I managed to stun you with my W? Let me just Q E R you really quickly. Boom! Join the glorious revolution! 
{{champion:143}} Oh, I managed to root you from a long distance with my massive-hitbox E? Let me just W W Q R you really quickly. Boom, you're dead!
{{champion:142}} Oh, this girl just makes me sick. 

Why does nearly every mage NEED to have hard CC in order for the person playing it to not be trash?
